description:
The bread battle has begun! Mokoyama unveils his ridiculously sweet Kouign Pudding Amman, which the judges give a perfect score! Does Kazuma’s Ja-pan stand a chance?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bikkuri Hattori!! Himitsu no Tare de Henshin ja!
Hattori est surpris !! Une sauce qui rehausse le pain !
อาจารย์ฮัตโตริตกใจ ! แปลงร่างด้วยซ้อสสูตรลับ!
びっくり服部!! 秘密のタレで変身じゃ!
